DOC.criteria: 1. stage I , II III breast cancer 2. receive neoadjuvant adjuvant chemotherapy without radiation 3. body mass index < 35 kg/m2 . 1. metastatic disease , prior history cancer , exclude nonmelanoma skin cancer , prior receipt chemotherapy 2. autoimmune , vascular neuromuscular disease could alter skeletal muscle 3. prior knee hip replacement 4. contraindication use neuromuscular electrical stimulation , include implanted cardiac defibrillator pacemaker , low extremity blood clot coagulopathy 5. pregnancy
